001
002package com.commercetools.compat;
003
004import java.util.function.Function;
005import java.util.function.Supplier;
006
007import com.commercetools.api.client.*;
008import com.commercetools.api.models.PagedQueryResourceRequest;
009
010import io.sphere.sdk.cartdiscounts.queries.CartDiscountQuery;
011import io.sphere.sdk.carts.queries.CartQuery;
012import io.sphere.sdk.categories.queries.CategoryQuery;
013import io.sphere.sdk.channels.queries.ChannelQuery;
014import io.sphere.sdk.customergroups.queries.CustomerGroupQuery;
015import io.sphere.sdk.customers.queries.CustomerQuery;
016import io.sphere.sdk.discountcodes.queries.DiscountCodeQuery;
017import io.sphere.sdk.expansion.ExpansionPath;
018import io.sphere.sdk.extensions.queries.ExtensionQuery;
019import io.sphere.sdk.inventory.queries.InventoryEntryQuery;
020import io.sphere.sdk.messages.queries.MessageQuery;
021import io.sphere.sdk.orders.queries.OrderQuery;
022import io.sphere.sdk.payments.queries.PaymentQuery;
023import io.sphere.sdk.productdiscounts.queries.ProductDiscountQuery;
024import io.sphere.sdk.products.ProductProjectionType;
025import io.sphere.sdk.products.queries.ProductProjectionQuery;
026import io.sphere.sdk.products.queries.ProductQuery;
027import io.sphere.sdk.producttypes.queries.ProductTypeQuery;
028import io.sphere.sdk.queries.MetaModelQueryDsl;
029import io.sphere.sdk.queries.QueryPredicate;
030import io.sphere.sdk.queries.QuerySort;
031import io.sphere.sdk.reviews.queries.ReviewQuery;
032import io.sphere.sdk.shippingmethods.queries.ShippingMethodQuery;
033import io.sphere.sdk.shoppinglists.queries.ShoppingListQuery;
034import io.sphere.sdk.states.queries.StateQuery;
035import io.sphere.sdk.stores.queries.StoreQuery;
036import io.sphere.sdk.subscriptions.queries.SubscriptionQuery;
037import io.sphere.sdk.taxcategories.queries.TaxCategoryQuery;
038import io.sphere.sdk.types.queries.TypeQuery;
039import io.sphere.sdk.zones.queries.ZoneQuery;
040
041public class QueryBuilder {
042    private final ProjectApiRoot apiRoot;
043
044    private QueryBuilder(final ProjectApiRoot apiRoot) {
045        this.apiRoot = apiRoot;
046    }
047
048    public static QueryBuilder of(final ProjectApiRoot apiRoot) {
049        return new QueryBuilder(apiRoot);
050    }
051
052    public static <T extends PagedQueryResourceRequest<T, TResult>, TResult, TQuery extends MetaModelQueryDsl<?, ?, ?, ?>> T query(
053            final T request, final TQuery queryDsl) {
054        PagedQueryResourceRequest<T, TResult> updatedRequest = queryDsl.limit() != null
055                ? request.withLimit(queryDsl.limit())
056                : request;
057        updatedRequest = queryDsl.offset() != null ? updatedRequest.withOffset(queryDsl.offset()) : updatedRequest;
058        updatedRequest = queryDsl.fetchTotal() != null ? updatedRequest.withWithTotal(queryDsl.fetchTotal())
059                : updatedRequest;
060        for (QuerySort<?> querySort : queryDsl.sort()) {
061            updatedRequest = updatedRequest.addSort(querySort.toSphereSort());
062        }
063        for (QueryPredicate<?> queryPredicate : queryDsl.predicates()) {
064            updatedRequest = updatedRequest.addWhere(queryPredicate.toSphereQuery());
065        }
066        for (ExpansionPath<?> expansionPath : queryDsl.expansionPaths()) {
067            updatedRequest = updatedRequest.addWhere(expansionPath.toSphereExpand());
068        }
069        return updatedRequest.asPagedQueryResourceRequestToBaseType();
070    }
071
072    public static <T extends PagedQueryResourceRequest<T, TResult>, TResult, TQuery extends MetaModelQueryDsl<?, ?, ?, ?>> T query(
073            final T request, final Supplier<TQuery> createQueryDsl, final Function<TQuery, TQuery> queryDsl) {
074        MetaModelQueryDsl<?, ?, ?, ?> query = queryDsl.apply(createQueryDsl.get());
075        return query(request, query);
076    }
077
078    public <T extends PagedQueryResourceRequest<T, TResult>, TResult, TQuery extends MetaModelQueryDsl<?, ?, ?, ?>> T with(
079            final Function<ProjectApiRoot, T> request, final Supplier<TQuery> createQueryDsl,
080            final Function<TQuery, TQuery> queryDsl) {
081        MetaModelQueryDsl<?, ?, ?, ?> query = queryDsl.apply(createQueryDsl.get());
082        return query(request.apply(apiRoot), query);
083    }
084
085    //    public PagedQueryResourceRequest apiClient(final Function<ApiClientQuery, ApiClientQuery> queryDsl) {
086    //        return query(apiRoot.apiClients().get(), ApiClientQuery::of, queryDsl);
087    //    }
088
089    public ByProjectKeyCartsGet cart(final Function<CartQuery, CartQuery> queryDsl) {
090        return query(apiRoot.carts().get(), CartQuery::of, queryDsl);
091    }
092
093    public ByProjectKeyCartDiscountsGet cartDiscount(final Function<CartDiscountQuery, CartDiscountQuery> queryDsl) {
094        return query(apiRoot.cartDiscounts().get(), CartDiscountQuery::of, queryDsl);
095    }
096
097    public ByProjectKeyCartDiscountsGet customObject(final Function<CartDiscountQuery, CartDiscountQuery> queryDsl) {
098        return query(apiRoot.cartDiscounts().get(), CartDiscountQuery::of, queryDsl);
099    }
100
101    public ByProjectKeyCustomersGet customer(final Function<CustomerQuery, CustomerQuery> queryDsl) {
102        return query(apiRoot.customers().get(), CustomerQuery::of, queryDsl);
103    }
104
105    public ByProjectKeyDiscountCodesGet discountCode(final Function<DiscountCodeQuery, DiscountCodeQuery> queryDsl) {
106        return query(apiRoot.discountCodes().get(), DiscountCodeQuery::of, queryDsl);
107    }
108
109    public ByProjectKeyCategoriesGet category(final Function<CategoryQuery, CategoryQuery> queryDsl) {
110        return query(apiRoot.categories().get(), CategoryQuery::of, queryDsl);
111    }

115    }

117    public ByProjectKeyProductsGet products(final Function<ProductQuery, ProductQuery> queryDsl) {
118        return query(apiRoot.products().get(), ProductQuery::of, queryDsl);
119    }
120
121    public ByProjectKeyProductProjectionsGet productProjections(
122            final Function<ProductProjectionQuery, ProductProjectionQuery> queryDsl) {
123        return query(apiRoot.productProjections().get(), ProductProjectionQuery::ofCurrent, queryDsl);
124    }
125
126    public ByProjectKeyProductProjectionsGet productProjectionsStaged(
127            final Function<ProductProjectionQuery, ProductProjectionQuery> queryDsl) {
128        return query(apiRoot.productProjections().get(), ProductProjectionQuery::ofStaged, queryDsl);
129    }
130
131    public ByProjectKeyProductProjectionsGet productProjections(final ProductProjectionType type,
132            final Function<ProductProjectionQuery, ProductProjectionQuery> queryDsl) {
133        return query(apiRoot.productProjections().get(), () -> ProductProjectionQuery.of(type), queryDsl);
134    }
135
136    public ByProjectKeyCustomerGroupsGet customerGroups(
137            final Function<CustomerGroupQuery, CustomerGroupQuery> queryDsl) {
